source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a medium full shot of a man standing in the center of the frame and in the middle ground. Tall, light-green grass occupies the foreground, partially obscuring his lower body. In the background, there is dense green foliage, trees, and a wooden deck structure. The camera is positioned at the subject's level. The shot then changes to a wide shot.
